UG.name: UG Epic Bot
UG.desc:
UG Epic Bot was a multipurpose utility bot. My first ever project, very dear to my heart.

Even if abandoned, the code is privated.

PSoP.name: PSoP
PSoP.desc:
PSoP was a simple bot about Smashing or Passing.

It is now archived. (regret)

SR.name: SwordRush
SR.desc:
An unfinished bot. It was an RPG with "intense" and fun combat mechanics.

Sadly, this was never finished due to lack of motivation.

DM.name: Discord Minigames!
DM.desc:
Another unfinished bot. DM! was a fun bot designed to play with your friends.
A wario-ware like.

rwOrigins.name: Rain World Origins
rwOrigins.desc: A side project that uses some of the Origins mentioned before. Probably abandoned, but hey, it happened!

vscode-origins-snippets.name: VS Code Origins Snippets
vscode-origins-snippets.desc: A collection of snippets from the Origins Minecraft mod, made for VS Code!

BT.name: Turtle Origin
BT.desc: This was my first Origin ever. It used a different Origin as a base, and I modified it afterwards.

KI.name: Kamali Origin
KI.desc: One of my first Origins aswell. This was completly original and I quite like the final product!

BA.name: Bat Origin
BA.desc: My second ever Origin. This was kind of a test, and later on the 'flapping' mechanic was reused on...

ugdev.name: UGDev
ugdev.desc: My own portfolio. You're seeing it right now and it took a while to code, so I hope you're liking it!

etv.name: ETV
etv.desc: Online tierlist maker and visualizer. Share your tierlist with friends and have fun!

secret.name: Secrets...
secret.desc:
Just FYI, this website has "hidden" pages, try to find them all!

(I spent way too much time on this please help)

gravix.name: Gravix
gravix.desc: A 2D platformer with ~35 single screen levels, an interconnected map and collectibles to find!

adc.name: A Directionless Cycle
adc.desc:
A sokoban puzzle game im working on, more yet to be revealed.

Keep an eye out!! <3

sps.name: Space Potato Station (Jam)
sps.desc:
A Game Jam with some friends in around 8 hours.

The final product is barely playable but the ideas we had were amazing.

boxfight.name: Boxfight
boxfight.desc:
A 2D, top-down roguelike, shoot down enemies and buy new weapons.

This was partially made with a friend in around a month and a half.

rpg.name: RPG Tech Demo
rpg.desc:
Your average generic 3D Unity project!

Basically a project for me to test navmeshes, animations and other stuff like that.

slugTheFirst.name: Slugcat the first
slugTheFirst.tooltip: My first slugcat of the many I've drawn.

staringContest.name: Staring contest
staringContest.tooltip: A Rain World (tamed) lizard having a staring contest with a sluggo!

construxion.name: Construxion the armadillo
construxion.tooltip: A fella I made to practice animations in Unity.

fuckingKity.name: F**king kity
fuckingKity.tooltip: Kity! A kitty drawn on top of a hand, meow.

ruinedPebbles.name: Ruined Pebbles
ruinedPebbles.tooltip: Oops, this might be Rain World spoilers.

RWAM2023Gour.name: RWAM 2023 - Gourmand
RWAM2023Gour.tooltip: Honestly, one of my best slugs. Absolute unit.

RWAM2023Memory.name: RWAM 2023 - Memory Conflux
RWAM2023Memory.image: /assets/images/artwork/RWAM2023/Memory Conflux - Rain World Art Month 2023 D2.png
RWAM2023Memory.tooltip: First time doing backgrounds. Not so bad!

RWAM2023Spear.name: RWAM 2023 - Spearmaster
RWAM2023Spear.tooltip: Spearmaster will be rich in no time.

blenderCyanLiz.name: Cyan Lizard - Rain World
blenderCyanLiz.tooltip: A cyan lizard from Rain World! (Rain world brain-rot is real)

wysTranslator.name: WYS Catalan Translator
wysTranslator.desc:
I'm one of the volunteer Catalan translators for Will You Snail!

(Unfinished, forgive me Jonas!!)

bootlegWordle.name: Bootleg Wordle
bootlegWordle.desc: A bootleg version of wordle that was made in the C# console for fun.

aStar.name: A* Pathfinding
aStar.desc: A simple pathfinding algorithm in Unity 3D/2D.
